name: Shining Souls
description:
Shining Souls is an indie game made by two guys. this is a story about exploring and saving souls. Players will encounter all kinds of interesting creatures, funny levels, stupid enemies and giant bosses in a very large underground labyrinth.
This is a challenging game, in which dear players will relearn the pure game pleasures.
It is strongly recommended to use the gamepad to play this game.You can control the position in the air more precisely.
It's a solo game, you'll be immerse in that challenges of the challenge, and you'll feel delight in the overwhelm BOSS.
It contain 70 designs of great design and different types of challenges, more than 10 lovely enemies, seven powerful BOSS as well as many interesting souls lost in the underground maze.
The skilled player, can enjoy a happy play for at least 4 hours, and complete the whole collection; Players who need more practice may need seven hours to play the game and complete the entire collection!
We sincerely hope that the players who like this game will support us.
You will love this game, even though she is not perfect, you will fall in love with her!
